/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A white truck is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
